Subject: RE: 5K - 6K STEEL BILLETS - CAPETOWN to DARESALAAM - SPOT ONWARDS & CAN TRY VSL DATES
Dear Samir / Ashish
Greetings of the Day !!
We have consulted with our clients, and they have expressed that their indicated rates are lower than expected.
Additionally, they are currently exploring RoRo options.
In the meantime, we are actively searching for a suitable vessel for the below cargo.
Last 5 fixed here.
+++++++++
CARGO: STEEL BILLETS
ABT 5000-6000 MT
CAPE TOWN/DARESALAAM
FLT TERMS
LAYCAN: SPOT ONWARDS & CAN TRY VSL DATES
3.75 PCT TTL
+++++++++
Please let us know if we can try MV UAL Castle or any.
Best Regards,
Ashish Bachchan
